text: Gerald Beach Brooks, 3rd Baron Crawshaw (1 April 1884 – 21 October 1946) was a British nobleman. ==Title and styles== *1 April 1884 – 5 February 1908: Gerald Beach Brooks *5 February 1908 – 19 January 1929: Honourable Gerald Beach Brooks *19 January 1929 – 21 October 1946: Sir Gerald Beach Brooks, 3rd Baronet of Crawshall Hall and Whatton House *19 January 1929 – 21 October 1946: Right Honourable Lord Crawshaw, 3rd Baron Crawshaw in the County of Lancaster and of Whatton in the County of Leicester. ==Coat of arms== ==Notes== Category:1884 births Category:1946 deaths Category:People from Long Whatton Category:British people of English descent Category:Baronets in the Baronetage of the United Kingdom Category:British landowners Gerald Beach Brooks, 3rd Baron Crawshaw
title: Gerald Beach Brooks, 3rd Baron Crawshaw
